body.p: The Board discussed the extent to which the IFRS should address the practical problems that have arisen from applying SFAS 131 in the US. The Board considered the FASB Q&A 131 Segment Information: Guidance on Applying Statement 131 and Emerging Issues Task Force (EITF) 04‑10 Determining Whether to Aggregate Operating Segments that do not Meet the Quantitative Threshold.
